mapper.insert: insert into ebook(ebook_id,ebook_name, ebook_category, collection_times, download_times, ebook_brief_information, download_user_id, download_user_name,ebook_size,ebook_state,information_state) values (#{ebookId},#{ebookName}, #{ebookCategory}, #{collectionTimes}, #{downloadTimes}, #{ebookBriefInformation}, #{downloadUserId}, #{downloadUserName}, #{ebookSize}, #{ebookState}, #{informationState})
mapper.select: select count(ebook_id) from ebook where (ebook_name = #{ebookName} and ebook_state = '上传成功') or (ebook_name = #{ebookName} and download_user_id = #{downloadUserId} and ebook_state != '已取消')

select ebook_id, ebook_name, ebook_category, collection_times, download_times, ebook_brief_information, download_user_id, download_user_name,ebook_size,ebook_state,information_state from ebook
and ebook_category like concat('%',#{ebookCategory,jdbcType=VARCHAR},'%')
and ebook_name like concat('%',#{ebookName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},'%')
and ebook_state = '审核中'
